name: JK Puzzle
description:
This game is a very simple and unadorned puzzle game.

Your goal, then, is to take the scattered puzzle, drag and place it in place, and finish the game.


Each time a level is completed, a picture of the current level will be unlocked, which can be viewed in the game title screen option, "Picture Appreciation".
Double-click the left mouse button to open and view the picture, click the right mouse button to close the picture under view.

If you want to exit this page, just click the right mouse button to exit.

This game will automatically save your play progress, every time you complete a level, you will unlock the access to the next level, and retain the play progress of the previous level.

Of course, this interface can only be entered after completing the first level, which is important to remember.

I hope you like it. Thank you.
